FilterItemPortable.Name: Bens adições
FilterItemPortable.ConditionsContent: <ArrayOfFilterCondition xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <FilterCondition Index="1"> <Value xsi:type="xsd:string"> A.ITEM IS NOT NULL AND A.DATAULTIMABAIXA IS NULL</Value> <UserInputRequired>false</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>true</IsManuallyDefined> <ParameterCollection /> </FilterCondition> </ArrayOfFilterCondition>
FilterItemPortable.WhereClauseContent: <WhereClause xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <Where> A.ITEM IS NOT NULL AND A.DATAULTIMABAIXA IS NULL</Where> <Parameters /> </WhereClause>

FilterItemPortable.Name: Bens ativos
FilterItemPortable.ConditionsContent: <ArrayOfFilterCondition xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <FilterCondition Index="1"> <Value xsi:type="xsd:string">A.ITEM IS NULL AND A.DATAULTIMABAIXA IS NULL </Value> <UserInputRequired>false</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>true</IsManuallyDefined> <ParameterCollection /> </FilterCondition> </ArrayOfFilterCondition>
FilterItemPortable.WhereClauseContent: <WhereClause xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <Where>A.ITEM IS NULL AND A.DATAULTIMABAIXA IS NULL </Where> <Parameters /> </WhereClause>

FilterItemPortable.Name: Bens baixados
FilterItemPortable.ConditionsContent: <ArrayOfFilterCondition xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <FilterCondition Index="1"> <Value xsi:type="xsd:string">A.DATAULTIMABAIXA IS NOT NULL AND A.DATAULTIMABAIXA = (SELECT MAX(DATA) FROM AT_ITEMMOVIMENTACOES WHERE ITEM = A.HANDLE AND MOVIMENTACAO IN (1,6) AND (EHBAIXAUNIAO = 'N' OR EHBAIXAUNIAO IS NULL)) </Value> <UserInputRequired>false</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>true</IsManuallyDefined> <ParameterCollection /> </FilterCondition> </ArrayOfFilterCondition>
FilterItemPortable.WhereClauseContent: <WhereClause xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <Where>A.DATAULTIMABAIXA IS NOT NULL AND A.DATAULTIMABAIXA = (SELECT MAX(DATA) FROM AT_ITEMMOVIMENTACOES WHERE ITEM = A.HANDLE AND MOVIMENTACAO IN (1,6) AND (EHBAIXAUNIAO = 'N' OR EHBAIXAUNIAO IS NULL)) </Where> <Parameters /> </WhereClause>

FilterItemPortable.Name: Bens baixados por união
FilterItemPortable.ConditionsContent: <ArrayOfFilterCondition xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <FilterCondition Index="1"> <Value xsi:type="xsd:string">A.DATAULTIMABAIXA IS NOT NULL AND A.DATAULTIMABAIXA = (SELECT MAX(DATA) FROM AT_ITEMMOVIMENTACOES WHERE ITEM = A.HANDLE AND MOVIMENTACAO = 1 AND EHBAIXAUNIAO = 'S') </Value> <UserInputRequired>false</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>true</IsManuallyDefined> <ParameterCollection /> </FilterCondition> </ArrayOfFilterCondition>
FilterItemPortable.WhereClauseContent: <WhereClause xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <Where>A.DATAULTIMABAIXA IS NOT NULL AND A.DATAULTIMABAIXA = (SELECT MAX(DATA) FROM AT_ITEMMOVIMENTACOES WHERE ITEM = A.HANDLE AND MOVIMENTACAO = 1 AND EHBAIXAUNIAO = 'S') </Where> <Parameters /> </WhereClause>

FilterItemPortable.Name: Bens em recuperação de ICMS
FilterItemPortable.ConditionsContent: <ArrayOfFilterCondition xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <FilterCondition Index="1"> <Value xsi:type="xsd:string">'S' = (SELECT B.CALCULAICMS FROM CT_CONTAS B WHERE B.HANDLE = A.CONTA ) AND A.RECUPERAICMS = 2 AND A.DATASAIDA IS NULL AND (A.COMPOSICAO = 1 OR (A.COMPOSICAO = 2 AND A.CONCLUSAOCOMPOSICAO IS NOT NULL AND A.RECUPERAICMSCOMPEMANDAMENTO = 'N') OR (A.COMPOSICAO = 3 AND A.RECUPERAICMSCOMPEMANDAMENTO = 'S') ) AND (SELECT COUNT(Z.HANDLE) FROM AT_ITEMCREDITOSICMS Z WHERE Z.ITEM = A.HANDLE) < A.NUMEROPARCELASRECUPERAICMS</Value> <UserInputRequired>false</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>true</IsManuallyDefined> </FilterCondition> </ArrayOfFilterCondition>
FilterItemPortable.WhereClauseContent: <WhereClause xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <Where>'S' = (SELECT B.CALCULAICMS FROM CT_CONTAS B WHERE B.HANDLE = A.CONTA ) AND A.RECUPERAICMS = 2 AND A.DATASAIDA IS NULL AND (A.COMPOSICAO = 1 OR (A.COMPOSICAO = 2 AND A.CONCLUSAOCOMPOSICAO IS NOT NULL AND A.RECUPERAICMSCOMPEMANDAMENTO = 'N') OR (A.COMPOSICAO = 3 AND A.RECUPERAICMSCOMPEMANDAMENTO = 'S') ) AND (SELECT COUNT(Z.HANDLE) FROM AT_ITEMCREDITOSICMS Z WHERE Z.ITEM = A.HANDLE) < A.NUMEROPARCELASRECUPERAICMS</Where> <Parameters /> </WhereClause>
